thread.title: Sales Promoter Required

author: wearehiring
title: Sales Promoter Required
text:
02   1 hour Description 
• Fixed Salary: 2500 + Incentives (on targets) • Required to work in any Mall/Store, as assigned by the company to sell Consumer Electronics & Home/Kitchen Appliances • Has a MANDATORY sales experience of 2 Years, especially in Consumer Electronics & Home/Kitchen Appliances • Good communication skills (English, Hindi, Malayalam, Urdu) • Ready to work/transfer in any Emirate in UAE. • Would be required to submit the sales report on time to the Sales Manager daily. • Customer focus
